headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Equifax (EFX) Raising 2025 Outlook After Mortgage and AI Growth
summary: Equifax Inc. recently reported third-quarter 2025 results, delivering revenue of US$1.54 billion and net income of US$160.2 million, both exceeding the prior year period, and subsequently raised its full-year earnings and revenue guidance on the back of strong growth in its mortgage and workforce solutions segments. An important development was the company's launch of Equifax Ignite AI Advisor, an AI-enabled analytics solution aimed at helping lenders, particularly smaller and mid-sized...
